alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Henry; Jo Daviess; Rock Island; Stephenson; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 2:53PM CST until January 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow expected. Winds of 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Wind chills of 10 to 20 below zero. Light snow or snow showers with a dusting of accumulation possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Iowa and northwest Illinois. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The patchy blowing and drifting snow will create hazardous conditions impacting the morning and evening commutes. Wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Henry; Jo Daviess; Rock Island; Stephenson; Whiteside
